is located in Renvyle, Connemara on the Wild Atlantic Way.n

The business is run by two locals who have an excellent knowledge of the area and will oblige you in any way we can. We are situated right beside the village of Tullycross, the location of the wonderful Connemara Mussel Festival which is held every year on the May bank holiday weekend.n

Some of the most beautiful beaches in the west of Ireland are on our doorstep, and it is only a few kilometres to Kylemore Abbey and Connemara National Park. There are picturesque and quiet routes for you to choose from and plenty of good pubs and restaurants to have a pint or sample some of the local food after a long (or short) scenic cycle around the area.n
Bikes are available for all ages and abilities and we offer reasonable rates. Weâ€™ll also provide you with a helmet, high visibility vest and a map of the Connemara Loop.
